thread.section_title: The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fabulous Experience
thread.title_full: Fabulous Experience - Review of The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: murphy957
title: Fabulous Experience
text: Great hotel! Our rooms were lovely. Service outstanding. We had the greatest time thanks to Judy, Nick, Gary, Jasmine, Nellie, Jose and Jimmy. The recommendation for car service to airport great idea, James, leaving in a white stretch limo (that cost only $12 more than taxi) made it easier to leave. Rich, you have a great team! We'll be back!
